modName: Eye of Melka Enhanced - Summon Melka
summary: Modifies the staff Eye of Melka: Now it can be used to summon Melka (the Hagraven NPC)
descriptionHtml:
Warning: if you haven\'t finished the mini quest inside the Blind Cliff Bastion, don\'t read this, otherwise you will get spoilers.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About this Mod:

This Mod modifies the prize of the mini quest inside the Blind Cliff Bastion: The Eye of Melka.

The Eye of Melka is a staff received after helping Melka, a friendly Hagraven, conquering back her dungeon from her sister, Petra.

The staff originally was an ordinary fireballs shooter. Now it summons Melka for 180 seconds.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTALATION:

Just download the only downloadable file and extract the .esp inside the .rar on the Data folder (it is usually located inside Program files/steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim in your pc).
author: Shishiwashi
